name: One Tap Runner
description:
Donate 20 Cents... You know you want to...

Control Indian Jones as he traverses levels, but you don't move him... Press space to stop him from moving, literally, that's all there is to the game. Oh yeah, and avoid the bad guys.

Features:

  • 27 unique levels
  • 3 different worlds to explore
  • Simple controls
  • Race mode


    • Planned:

  • Built in help


    • N.B. This game was designed to work with the GameJolt API so for the race mode to work, you need to login with a GamJolt account. To log in, click on the GameJolt logo in the top right hand corner.
